metadata.title: CVE-2021-42780 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use after return issue was found in Opensc before version 0.22.0 ininsert_pin function that could potentially crash programs using thelibrary.

criterions.comment: opensc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
